headline: Monolithic Power Systems to Report Third Quarter 2025 Results on October 30, 2025
summary: San Jose, Calif., Oct. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Monolithic Power Systems, Inc. (MPS) (Nasdaq: MPWR), a fabless global company that provides high-performance, semiconductor-based power electronics solutions, today announced plans to report its financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025. MPS will report its results after the market closes on Thursday, October 30th. Along with the earnings announcement, MPS will provide written commentary on its results of operations for t

headline: KeyBanc Capital Markets Lifts Monolithic Power Systems, Inc. (MPWR) Price Target Buoyed By Growing Business
summary: Monolithic Power Systems, Inc. (NASDAQ:MPWR) is one of the high-growth semiconductor stocks that are profitable in 2025. On September 30, KeyBanc Capital Markets raised the stock’s price target to $1,050 from $950 and maintained an ‘Overweight’ rating, impressed by the company’s strengthening position in the AI chip power management market. The price target hike comes […]

headline: Here’s What Lifted Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) in Q3

headline: Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) Faces Lawsuit as AI Demand Rises—Are Margin Risks Underappreciated?
summary: Reed Semiconductor Corp. recently filed a patent infringement lawsuit against Monolithic Power Systems in the United States District Court for the Western District of Texas, alleging infringement of U.S. Patent No. 7,960,955 and bad-faith interference with Reed's business relationships. This lawsuit arrives as Monolithic Power Systems continues to see heightened demand for its power-management products amid surging interest in artificial intelligence infrastructure and competitive sector...

headline: Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR): Assessing Valuation as AI Hype and Legal Risks Push Shares to Fresh Highs
summary: Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) is back in the spotlight after Reed Semiconductor filed a fresh patent infringement lawsuit. Investor optimism around the stock continues to build, with MPWR reaching record-setting highs and strong sector momentum. See our latest analysis for Monolithic Power Systems. Despite the latest legal challenge from Reed Semiconductor, Monolithic Power Systems’ momentum hasn’t slowed. The stock just notched a new 52-week high as investor enthusiasm, analyst upgrades,...
